ISSUE.TITLE: The "image squares" attributes need an additional class name that will allow us to distinguish them from plain color squares
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The "image squares" attributes need an additional class name that will allow us to distinguish them from plain color squares, something like this: <ul class="option-list color-squares image-squares"> ... Currently they have only the option-list and color-squares class names which is sometimes not enough. Source: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/2152
